info.title: Payment Request
info.description: A payment request is a request for payment (partial or full) of an invoice. This API provides methods to create or update a payment request, or view a payment request by ID.

get.summary: Gets all relevant information of a Payment Request.
get.description: This API Gets all relevant information (Payment Request Header, Payment Request Line Item and Payment Request Allocation) of a Payment Request.

post.description: Creates a new Payment Request with all relevant details including line items and associated allocations.

parameters.name: paymentRequest
parameters.description: An XML or JSON representation of a Payment Request.

put.description: Updates a Payment Request with all relevant details including line items and associated allocations.

parameters.name: paymentRequest
parameters.description: An XML or JSON representation of a Payment Request.

IsTestUser.description: Indication that the Allocation record was created by a test user (this is a true/false).

Percentage.description: The percentage of the Request Line Item that the individual allocation record. All Allocations associated to a given Line Item should add up to 100.

Name.description: The name given to the company location.

AllocationStatus.description: Current amount of allocation performed on the Request Line Item (accepted values: None, Partial, Full).

AmountWithoutVat.description: The net amount of the line item (excluding VAT).

ApprovedLineItemAmount.description: The approved amount of the line item.

DeliverySlipNumber.description: The delivery slip number associated with receiving receipt.

Description.description: Brief overview of the good or service ordered.

ExpenseTypeCode.description: A code which indicates the Expense Type for the Line Item.

IsMatched.description: Indication that the Payment Request Line Item is associated to a Purchase Order Line Item (this is a true/false).

LineItemId.description: The identifier of the payment request line item. The ID is only guaranteed to be unique for a given payment request.

LineItemIsTestUser.description: Indication that the Allocation record was created by a test user (this is a true/false).

MatchedPurchaseOrderLineItemId.description: The identifier of the purchase order line item to which the payment request line item is matched (if any).

PurchaseOrderNumber.description: The identifier of the purchase order containing the line item to which the payment request line item is matched (if any).

Quantity.description: Total number of goods or services ordered.

RequestedLineItemAmount.description: The requested amount of the line item.

RequestLineItemNumber.description: The relative location of the Line Item in relation to other Line Items in the Payment Request.

ShipFromPostalCode.description: The postal code the good or service was shipped from.

ShipToPostalCode.description: The postal code the good or service will be shipped to.

SupplierPartId.description: The unique identifier provided by the supplier that is associated with the good or service.

Tax.description: The tax associated with the line item.

TaxCode.description: The Tax Code  assigned for the Line Item, based on the Tax Setting.

TaxCode2.description: The Tax Code 2 assigned for the Line Item, based on the Tax Setting.

TaxCode3.description: The Tax Code 3 assigned for the Line Item, based on the Tax Setting.

TaxCode4.description: The Tax Code 4 assigned for the Line Item, based on the Tax Setting.

TotalPrice.description: The total amount of the line item.

UnitOfMeasure.description: The code for the measurement unit used to quantify the good or service. Use GET /invoice/localizeddata to look up codes and descriptions.

UnitPrice.description: The cost for a single unit of the line item good or service.

VatAmount.description: The amount of VAT 1 included in the line item total.

VatAmountFour.description: The amount of VAT 4 included in the line item total.

VatAmountThree.description: The amount of VAT 3 included in the line item total.

VatAmountTwo.description: The amount of VAT 2 included in the line item total.

VatRate.description: The VAT rate 1 applied to the net line item total.

VatRateFour.description: The VAT rate 4 applied to the net line item total.

VatRateThree.description: The VAT rate 3 applied to the net line item total.

VatRateTwo.description: The VAT rate 2 applied to the net line item total.

AmountWithoutVat.description: The net amount of the invoice (excluding VAT).

ApprovalStatus.description: A code which indicates the Approval Status of the payment request.

ApprovedByDelegate.description: Was the Payment Request approved by a Delegate (true/false).

AssignedDate.description: The date the Payment Request was assigned to the current owner.

BuyerCostCenter.description: The company defined center responsible for the Payment Request.

CalculatedAmount.description: The sum of all Line Item Amounts plus Shipping Amount and Tax Amount for the payment request.

CheckNumber.description: Check number of the payment made to the vendor.

CreatedByUsername.description: Username of the Payment Request creator.

CurrencyCode.description: The 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code for the expense report currency. Examples: USD - US dollars; BRL - Brazilian real; CAD - Canadian dollar; CHF - Swiss franc; EUR - Euro; GBO - Pound sterling; HKD - Hong Kong dollar; INR - Indian rupee; MXN - Mexican peso; NOK - Norwegian krone; SEK - Swedish krona.

DataSource.description: A code which indicates the method used to created the Payment Request. Use GET /invoice/localizeddata to translate the code into text.

DeletedDate.description: The date the user deleted the payment request.

DeliverySlipNumber.description: The delivery slip number associated with receiving receipt.

Description.description: User entered description of the Payment Request.

DiscountPercentage.description: The discount from the supplier if the discount terms are met.

DiscountTerms.description: The NET discount terms with a supplier when discounts apply.

EmployeeName.description: The owner of the Payment Request.

ExtractDate.description: The date the payment request was extracted, in order to import it into an accounts payable system and generate a payment.

FirstApprovalDate.description: The date the payment request received its first approval in its approval workflow.

FirstSubmitDate.description: The date the payment request was first submitted.

ID.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

InvoiceAmount.description: User-entered value representing the total invoice amount, used to calculate amount remaining on the line item page.

InvoiceDate.description: The date the Vendor issued the Invoice.

InvoiceNumber.description: The Invoice Number from the vendor for the Payment Request.

InvoiceReceivedDate.description: The date on which the invoice was received.

IsInvoiceConfirmed.description: Indicates if the Payment Request Invoice is confirmed or in a different status (true/false).

IsPaymentRequestDuplicate.description: Is the Payment Request identified as a duplicate of another existing request (true/false).

IsTestTransaction.description: Is the Payment Request a test transaction (true/false).

LastSubmitDate.description: The date the payment request was last submitted.

LedgerCode.description: A code which indicates which company journal the Payment Request is assigned to. Use GET /invoice/localizeddata to translate the code into text.

LineItemTotalAmount.description: The sum of all Line Item Amounts.

LineItemVatAmount.description: The sum amount of VAT from all line items in the request.

NotesToVendor.description: Information from the customer to the vendor for special requests or handling for the ordered good or service.

OB10BuyerId.description: A unique buyer account on the OB10 network.

OB10TransactionId.description: Unique Identifier for the PR transaction (generated by OB10).

OrgUnit01.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

OrgUnit02.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

OrgUnit03.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

OrgUnit04.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

OrgUnit05.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

OrgUnit06.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

PaidAmount.description: Represents the amount of the payment that will be/has been made for the Invoice.

PaidDate.description: The date payment was made to the vendor.

PaymentAdjustmentNotes.description: Notes to the vendor regarding the amount paid (underpayment due to damages, for example).

PaymentDueDate.description: The date the vendor needs to be paid by.

PaymentMethod.description: A code which indicates the method used to reimburse the vendor for the Payment Request. Use GET /invoice/localizeddata to translate the code into text.

PaymentRequestCreatedByTestUser.description: Was the Payment Request created by a Test User (true/false).

PaymentRequestDeletedBy.description: The user who deleted the Payment Request.

PaymentStatus.description: A code which indicates the Payment Status of the payment request.

PaymentTermsDays.description: This number, along with type of payment terms (example: NET), determine when the invoice is expected to be paid.

PurchaseOrderNumber.description: The purchase order number for the purchase order associated with the invoice.

ReceiptConfirmationType.description: A code which indicates the receipt confirmation type for this Payment Request (Invoice Confirmation, for example). Use GET /invoice/localizeddata to translate the code into text.

ShippingAmount.description: The value for the Shipping Amount header field.

SubmittedByDelegate.description: Was the Payment Request created by a Delegate (true/false).

TaxAmount.description: The value for the Tax Amount header field.

TaxCode.description: The Tax Code assigned for the Request, based on the Tax Setting.

TaxCode2.description: The Tax Code assigned for the Request, based on the Tax Setting.

TotalApprovedAmount.description: The total amount that has been approved.

UserCreationDate.description: The date the Invoice user first saved the payment request.

VatAmountFour.description: The amount of VAT included in the invoice total. (Fourth of four VAT amount fields available.)

VatAmountOne.description: The amount of VAT included in the invoice total. (First of four VAT amount fields available.)

VatAmountThree.description: The amount of VAT included in the invoice total. (Third of four VAT amount fields available.)

VatAmountTwo.description: The amount of VAT included in the invoice total. (Second of four VAT amount fields available.)

VatRateFour.description: The VAT rate applied to the net invoice total. (Should relate to the fourth VAT amount field.)

VatRateOne.description: The VAT rate applied to the net invoice total. (Should relate to the first VAT amount field.)

VatRateThree.description: The VAT rate applied to the net invoice total. (Should relate to the third VAT amount field.)

VatRateTwo.description: The VAT rate applied to the net invoice total. (Should relate to the second VAT amount field.)

WorkflowCompleteDate.description: The date the last step in the workflow process completed.

Description.description: Brief overview of the good or service ordered.

ExpenseTypeCode.description: A code which indicates the Expense Type for the Line Item.

ItemCode.description: Represents the item code (the unique code a vendor assigns to a good or code a vendor assigns to a good or service to identify it).

LineItemID.description: Line Item ID of the Payment Request.

PurchaseOrderNumber.description: Purchase Order that is associated to the Line Item .

Quantity.description: Total number of goods or services ordered.

ShipFromPostalCode.description: The postal code the good or service was shipped from.

ShipToPostalCode.description: The postal code the good or service will be shipped to.

SupplierPartId.description: The unique identifier provided by the supplier that is associated with the good or service.

Tax.description: The tax associated with the line item.

TaxCode.description: The Tax Code  assigned for the Line Item, based on the Tax Setting.

TaxCode2.description: The Tax Code 2 assigned for the Line Item, based on the Tax Setting.

TaxCode3.description: The Tax Code 3 assigned for the Line Item, based on the Tax Setting.

TaxCode4.description: The Tax Code 4 assigned for the Line Item, based on the Tax Setting.

UnitOfMeasure.description: The code for the measurement unit used to quantify the good or service. Use GET /invoice/localizeddata to look up codes and descriptions.

UnitPrice.description: The cost for a single unit of the line item good or service.

VatAmount.description: The amount of VAT 1 included in the line item total.

VatAmountFour.description: The amount of VAT 4 included in the line item total.

CheckNumber.description: Check number of the payment made to the vendor.

CompanyBillToAddressCode.description: The code which identifies the company location to which the vendor billed the invoice.

CompanyShipToAddressCode.description: The code which identifies the company location to which the vendor shipped items listed in the invoice.

CurrencyCode.description: The 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code for the expense report currency. Examples: USD - US dollars; BRL - Brazilian real; CAD - Canadian dollar; CHF - Swiss franc; EUR - Euro; GBO - Pound sterling; HKD - Hong Kong dollar; INR - Indian rupee; MXN - Mexican peso; NOK - Norwegian krone; SEK - Swedish krona.

DataSource.description: A code which indicates the method used to created the Payment Request. Use GET /invoice/localizeddata to translate the code into text.

DeliverySlipNumber.description: The delivery slip number associated with receiving receipt.

Description.description: User entered description of the Payment Request.

DiscountPercentage.description: The discount from the supplier if the discount terms are met.

DiscountTerms.description: The NET discount terms with a supplier when discounts apply.

EmployeeEmailAddress.description: The email address of the employee to whom the request should be assigned. Not evaluated if EmployeeLoginId or EmployeeId match an employee. This value is required if none of the following are provided: LedgerCode, EmployeeLoginId, EmployeeId; PurchaseOrderNumber; ExternalPolicyId.

EmployeeId.description: The company ID of the employee to whom the request should be assigned. Has precedence over EmployeeEmail; not evaluated if EmployeeLoginId matches an employee. This value is required if none of the following are provided: LedgerCode, EmployeeLoginId; EmployeeEmail; PurchaseOrderNumber; ExternalPolicyId.

EmployeeLoginId.description: The login ID of the employee to whom the request should be assigned. Has precedence over EmployeeId and EmployeeEmail. This value is required if none of the following are provided: LedgerCode, EmployeeId; EmployeeEmail; PurchaseOrderNumber; ExternalPolicyId.

ExternalPolicyId.description: The external policy ID of the Payment Request. This value is required if none of the following are provided: LedgerCode, EmployeeLoginId, EmployeeId; EmployeeEmail; PurchaseOrderNumber.

InvoiceAmount.description: User-entered value representing the total invoice amount, used to calculate amount remaining on the line item page.

InvoiceDate.description: The date the Vendor issued the Invoice.

InvoiceNumber.description: The Invoice Number from the vendor for the Payment Request.

InvoiceReceivedDate.description: The date on which the invoice was received.

IsEmergencyCheckRun.description: Is an emergency check run required(Y/N).

IsInvoiceConfirmed.description: Indicates if the Payment Request Invoice is confirmed or in a different status (true/false).

LedgerCode.description: A code which indicates which company journal the Payment Request is assigned to. Use GET /invoice/localizeddata to obtain valid codes. This value is required if none of the following are provided: EmployeeLoginId; EmployeeId; EmployeeEmail; PurchaseOrderNumber; ExternalPolicyId.

NotesToVendor.description: Information from the customer to the vendor for special requests or handling for the ordered good or service.

OB10BuyerId.description: A unique buyer account on the OB10 network.

OB10TransactionId.description: Unique Identifier for the PR transaction (generated by OB10).

OrgUnit01.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

OrgUnit02.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

OrgUnit03.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

OrgUnit04.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

OrgUnit05.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

OrgUnit06.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

PaymentAdjustmentNotes.description: Notes to the vendor regarding the amount paid (underpayment due to damages, for example).

PaymentAmount.description: Represents the amount of the payment that will be/has been made for the Invoice.

PaymentDueDate.description: The date the vendor needs to be paid by.

PaymentTermsDays.description: This number, along with type of payment terms (example: NET), determine when the invoice is expected to be paid.

PurchaseOrderId.description: The ID of the Purchase Order to which the Payment Request should be matched. This value is required if none of the following are provided: LedgerCode, EmployeeLoginId, EmployeeId; EmployeeEmail; ExternalPolicyId.

ReceiptConfirmationType.description: A code which indicates the receipt confirmation type for this Payment Request (Invoice Confirmation, for example). Use GET /invoice/localizeddata to translate the code into text.

ShippingAmount.description: The value for the Shipping Amount header field.

TaxAmount.description: The value for the Tax Amount header field.

VatAmountFour.description: The amount of VAT included in the invoice total. (Fourth of four VAT amount fields available.)

VatAmountOne.description: The amount of VAT included in the invoice total. (First of four VAT amount fields available.)

VatAmountThree.description: The amount of VAT included in the invoice total. (Third of four VAT amount fields available.)

VatAmountTwo.description: The amount of VAT included in the invoice total. (Second of four VAT amount fields available.)

VatRateFour.description: The VAT rate applied to the net invoice total. (Should relate to the fourth VAT amount field.)

VatRateOne.description: The VAT rate applied to the net invoice total. (Should relate to the first VAT amount field.)

VatRateThree.description: The VAT rate applied to the net invoice total. (Should relate to the third VAT amount field.)

VatRateTwo.description: The VAT rate applied to the net invoice total. (Should relate to the second VAT amount field.)

VendorShipFromAddressCode.description: The code which identifies the location from which the vendor shipped items listed in the invoice.

AmountWithoutVat.description: The net amount of the invoice (excluding VAT).

BuyerCostCenter.description: The company defined center responsible for the Payment Request.

CheckNumber.description: Check number of the payment made to the vendor.

CompanyBillToAddressCode.description: The code which identifies the company location to which the vendor billed the invoice.

CompanyShipToAddressCode.description: The code which identifies the company location to which the vendor shipped items listed in the invoice.

CurrencyCode.description: The 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code for the expense report currency. Examples: USD - US dollars; BRL - Brazilian real; CAD - Canadian dollar; CHF - Swiss franc; EUR - Euro; GBO - Pound sterling; HKD - Hong Kong dollar; INR - Indian rupee; MXN - Mexican peso; NOK - Norwegian krone; SEK - Swedish krona.

Custom01.description: The details from the Custom fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

Custom02.description: The details from the Custom fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

Custom03.description: The details from the Custom fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

DeliverySlipNumber.description: The delivery slip number associated with receiving receipt.

Description.description: User entered description of the Payment Request.

DiscountPercentage.description: The discount from the supplier if the discount terms are met.

DiscountTerms.description: The NET discount terms with a supplier when discounts apply.

DoCopyDown.description: Use new Request Owner's employee copydown values in this request

DoCopyDownFromPO.description: Use purchase order copydown values in this request

EmployeeEmailAddress.description: The email address of the employee to whom the request should be assigned. Not evaluated if EmployeeLoginId or EmployeeId match an employee.

EmployeeId.description: The company ID of the employee to whom the request should be assigned. Has precedence over EmployeeEmail; not evaluated if EmployeeLoginId matches an employee.

EmployeeLoginId.description: The login ID of the employee to whom the request should be assigned. Has precedence over EmployeeId and EmployeeEmail.

InvoiceAmount.description: User-entered value representing the total invoice amount, used to calculate amount remaining on the line item page.

InvoiceDate.description: The date the Vendor issued the Invoice.

InvoiceNumber.description: The Invoice Number from the vendor for the Payment Request.

InvoiceReceivedDate.description: The date on which the invoice was received.

IsEmergencyCheckRun.description: Is an emergency check run required(Y/N).

IsInvoiceConfirmed.description: Indicates if the Payment Request Invoice is confirmed or in a different status (true/false).

NotesToVendor.description: Information from the customer to the vendor for special requests or handling for the ordered good or service.

OB10BuyerId.description: A unique buyer account on the OB10 network.

OB10TransactionId.description: Unique Identifier for the PR transaction (generated by OB10).

OrgUnit01.description: The details from the Organization Unit fields. These may not have data, depending on configuration.

PaymentAmount.description: Represents the amount of the payment that will be/has been made for the Invoice.

PaymentDueDate.description: The date the vendor needs to be paid by.

PaymentTermsDays.description: This number, along with type of payment terms (example: NET), determine when the invoice is expected to be paid.

PurchaseOrderId.description: The ID of the Purchase Order to which the Payment Request should be matched.

ReceiptConfirmationType.description: A code which indicates the receipt confirmation type for this Payment Request (Invoice Confirmation, for example). Use GET /invoice/localizeddata to translate the code into text.

RequestID.description: The Request ID of the Payment Request

ShippingAmount.description: The value for the Shipping Amount header field.

TaxAmount.description: The value for the Tax Amount header field.

VatAmountFour.description: The amount of VAT included in the invoice total. (Fourth of four VAT amount fields available.)

VatAmountOne.description: The amount of VAT included in the invoice total. (First of four VAT amount fields available.)

VatAmountThree.description: The amount of VAT included in the invoice total. (Third of four VAT amount fields available.)

VatAmountTwo.description: The amount of VAT included in the invoice total. (Second of four VAT amount fields available.)

VatRateFour.description: The VAT rate applied to the net invoice total. (Should relate to the fourth VAT amount field.)

VatRateOne.description: The VAT rate applied to the net invoice total. (Should relate to the first VAT amount field.)

VatRateThree.description: The VAT rate applied to the net invoice total. (Should relate to the third VAT amount field.)

VatRateTwo.description: The VAT rate applied to the net invoice total. (Should relate to the second VAT amount field.)

VendorShipFromAddressCode.description: The code which identifies the location from which the vendor shipped items listed in the invoice.

DiscountTerms.description: The NET discount terms with a supplier when discounts apply.

AddressCode.description: The code which identifies a particular vendor location.

VendorCode.description: The code which identifies a particular vendor.
